pwd = present working directory

```{bash}
pwd
```

```{bash}
ls --help
```

```{bash}
ls -l -h
```

```{bash}
man ls
```

```{bash}
pwd

```


#Important directory syntax

~ = home directory
. = current directory
.. = above directory (folder that contains current directory)
/ = root directory
